---
pagetitle: Forage fish
---

- [info_link](https://olympiccoast.noaa.gov/living/marinelife/fish/fish.html)
- [info_tagline](Forage fish, also called prey fish or bait fish, are small fishes that are important food for larger predators including larger fish, seabirds, seals and sea lions. Forage fish, such as anchovies and surf smelt, feed near the base of the food chain on plankton.)
